definition: Taiwan pr. used in 夾生|夹生[jia1 sheng1] and 夾竹桃|夹竹桃[jia1 zhu2 tao2]
to press from either side/to place in between/to sandwich/to carry sth under armpit/wedged between/between/to intersperse/to mix/to mingle/clip/folder/Taiwan pr. [jia2]
martial arts chivalry (Chinese literary, theatrical and cinema genre)/knight-errant
Sanxia wuyi (lit. Three knight-errants and five righteous one), novel edited from stories of late Qing dynasty pinghua 評話|评话 master storyteller Shi Yukun 石玉昆
chivalrous/helping the weak for the sake of justice

sentences.english: Recently, have you seen 3D cartoon film Pigman in CCTVstation?
sentences.chinese: 最近，你看过中央台播出的3D卡通片《猪猪侠》吗？

sentences.english: I want the head of the green hornet and I want it tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我想要青锋侠的脑袋，今晚就要。

sentences.english: "Errant Knight"has different parts of speech and related meanings in ancient Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 在古代汉语中，“侠”字具有多种词性和丰富的内涵。

sentences.english: But this Green Hornet guy? "This is awesome!" he yells.
sentences.chinese: 但这个叫青蜂侠的家伙呢？

sentences.english: Tang Dynasty was a period of full boom of the chant poems on chivalry.
sentences.chinese: 唐代是咏侠诗的繁荣鼎盛时期。

sentences.english: The Atom is officially coming alive on Arrow.
sentences.chinese: 原子侠真的要出现在美剧《绿箭侠》中了。

sentences.english: The feeling of being a lifesaver has become familiar to the Dargon Slayers .
sentences.chinese: “屠龙侠”对作为生命拯救者的感觉已经不陌生了。

sentences.english: Sheldon:Yes, the Dr. Doom to my Mr. Fantastic.
sentences.chinese: 是的，就如毁灭博士对神奇侠。

sentences.english: Does my Iron Man collectible figurine watch me when I sleep?
sentences.chinese: 我收藏的钢铁侠公仔也会在我睡觉的时候看着我吗？

sentences.english: I wanna see the Green Hornet movie for the simple fact it has a hot asian guy co-starring.
sentences.chinese: 想看青蜂侠，只是因为里面有个很帅的亚洲人。

sentences.english: The movie "batman" is the biggest block-buster movie of 1989.
sentences.chinese: 侠》是1989年最有影响的大制作影片。

sentences.english: Iron Man 2 holds onto and glorifies the myriad of strong points from the first film.
sentences.chinese: 《钢铁侠2》拥有抱和美化第一部电影的众多优势。

sentences.english: Iron Man wins, but barely, and Ivan's locked up.
sentences.chinese: 钢铁侠侥幸获胜，“鞭锁”被关了起来。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, Wang Yi-sheng embodies Tao culture and Chivalrous culture.
sentences.chinese: 其实，王一生是道家文化和侠文化的结合体。

sentences.english: Iron Man and the Hulk are among the Avengers that Marvel already has tapped.
sentences.chinese: 钢铁侠和绿巨人就是复仇者之中马维尔已经开发过的。

definition: rivers and lakes/all corners of the country/remote areas to which hermits retreat/section of society operating independently of mainstream society, out of reach of the law/the milieu in which wuxia tales play out (cf. 武俠|武侠[wu3 xia2])/(in late imperial times) world of traveling merchants, itinerant doctors, fortune tellers etc/demimonde/(in modern times) triads/secret gangster societies/underworld
martial arts chivalry (Chinese literary, theatrical and cinema genre)/knight-errant
to root out the strong and give people peace (idiom); to rob the rich and give to the poor
lit. to go up to heaven or down to Hades (idiom)/fig. to go to great lengths/to search heaven and earth
